title: As a MNC Admin, I want MJ Misc and MN Misc Terms to be BOC Only
custom_steps:
AC:

* In Addendum B of all MN Contract Types, the MJ Misc terms and MN Misc terms will be BOC Only.  Club Users will not be able to add these terms.

title: As a MNC Admin, I want an error returned if a domestic player is being signed to the DSL
custom_steps:
AC:

* If a player who is subject to the Rule 4 draft may not be signed to the DSL by a club user
* The system will perform a check on submit and approve
* If the player is subject to the draft and the signing club is a DSL team, the system will return a hard error for Club users and an overrideable warning for BOC users
** Title: Error
** Text: Domestic players may not be assigned to the DSL without approval.  Please contact the BOC for assistance.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

+Testing Scenarios:+

* Drafted Players
* Passed Over Players

title: As a MNC Admin, I want to limit who can have a Housing Allowance in their MNC
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new Non-First Year MNC rule check On Submit and greater, the system will perform a check to ensure the playerâ€™s Add C salary is between $4666.67 and $8400, unless they have an active ML UPC
** Title: Error
** Body: Playerâ€™s weekly salary must be between $4,666.67 and $8,400.00 to receive Housing Allowance.  Please contact the BOC for assistance.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

* Clicking Back will dismiss the modal and return the user to the contract
* Clicking Ignore & Continue will allow the user to by pass the error

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Add C + Housing on Non-First Year Contracts to be Limited to $8,400
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1641|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1641|smart-link] 

Wire: [https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|smart-link] 

AC:

* On Submit and Approve of Non-First Year MNCs, the system will perform a check to ensure the Add C + Housing Total is not greater than $8,400
* If the total is greater than $8,400, the system will return a hard error for club users and an overrideable warning for BOC Users
** Title: Error
** Body: Weekly Addendum C and Housing amounts may not be more than $8,400.  Please contact the BOC for assistance.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back
* Clicking Back will dismiss the modal and return the user to the contract
* Clicking Ignore & Continue will allow the user to by pass the error

title: As an MNC Admin, I want to see a Add C and Housing summary on Non-First Year MNCs
custom_steps:
WIre: [https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|smart-link] 

AC:

* On Non-First Year MNCs, there will be a new â€œAddendum C / Housingâ€� section
* In this section will be a â€œTotalâ€� field and a table comprised of the following:
** Addendum C
** Housing Allowance
* The Amount column will display the total amount offered from its respective section of the contract
** The Add C row will display the highest weekly amount from the Add C
* The Total field will be a sum of all the individual amounts
* The table will be dynamic and will not display sections that are not included in the contract
** For example, if there are no Housing terms included, they wonâ€™t appear in the table

title: As a MNC Admin, I want MN Total Guaranteed to be Limited to $4M
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1639|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1639|smart-link] 

Wire: [https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|smart-link] 

AC:

* On Submit and Approve of Non-First Year MNCs, the system will perform a check to ensure the Minor League Total Guaranteed is not greater than $100,000
* If the total is greater than $100K, the system will return a hard error for club users and an overrideable warning for BOC Users
** Title: Error
** Body: Minor League Total Guaranteed may not be more than $100,000.  Please contact the BOC for assistance.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back
* Clicking Back will dismiss the modal and return the user to the contract
* Clicking Ignore & Continue will allow the user to by pass the error

title: As an MNC Admin, I want the Addendum B section on Non-First Year Contracts Updated
custom_steps:
AC:

* On Non-First Year MNCs, the follow updates will be added to the Addendum B:
* +Minor-League Terms+
** Housing Allowance
*** Language Drop Down and Weekly Amount Field
** Individual Hotel Room
*** Language Only
** Interpreter
*** Language Only
* +Termination Pay+
** Remove Fixed Lump Sum
** Remove Unearned Salary
** Remove Spring Training 
** Add Spring Training Release
** Remove Offset
** Add Championship Season Release
* +Major-League Terms+
** Interpreter
*** Language Only
* These updates should only apply to contracts signed with the new CBA (after 3/30/2023) 
* Old contracts should continue to display the same as before

title: As a League Econ Admin, I want filters added to the Employee Contract Advanced Search
custom_steps:
AC:

* The following filter types will be added to the Employee Contract Advanced Search Type:

* Start Year
** Will reflect the UECâ€™s Start Year
* Level of Play
** Will reflect the UECâ€™s LOP and correspond to the LOP result column

title: As MNC Admin, I want printed Offset Salary Term Updated
custom_steps:
Context: The Offset Salary Earned Termination Pay Clause is being renamed to Championship Season Release.  The printed title will need to be updated as well.

Related to: [PIVOTAL-1625|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1625]

AC:

* If a Championship Season Release clause is added to a MNC, that title will appear on the printed version of the MNC and will no longer display â€œOffset Salary Earnedâ€�

!image-20230504-201018 (1d02edb5-4375-44b7-9d20-6cc15f237d6a).png|width=1038,height=355!

title: As an MNC Admin, I want to see a summary of MN total guaranteed compensation on Non-First Year MNCs
custom_steps:
WIre: [https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|smart-link] 

AC:

* On Non-First Year MNCs, there will be a new â€œMinor League Total Guaranteedâ€� section, as depicted in the wire
* In this section will be a â€œTotalâ€� field and a table comprised of the following:
** Signing Bonus
** Spring Training Release
** Championship Season Release
** MN Misc
* The Amount column will display the total amount offered from its respective section of the contract
* The Total field will be a sum of all the individual amounts
** If both Spring Training Release and Championship Season Release are included in the contract, both should be displayed in the table, however, only the higher amount should be included in the sum.  (The player can only receive one, so including both would be incorrect)
* The table will be dynamic and will not display sections that are not included in the contract
** For example, if there is not MN Misc or Signing Bonus terms included, they wonâ€™t appear in the table
* If none of the applicable terms are included in the contract, the table will not appear and the Total will display $0
* MN Misc should have an â€œâ€œAmountâ€� field included

title: Self Service Query / Report for HR
custom_steps:
For benefits purposes, HR needs to track players leaving or joining the CLE org.  The report needs to be self-service as they will need to run it weekly for 2023.

One report with 4 sheets:

* All players traded TO CLE
* All players traded FROM CLE
* All players signed by CLE (only players with a previous MNC, no MJ players)
* All players released by CLE

Results for each sheet:

* EBISID
* Name
* DOB
* TX Date / Signing Date
* TO Org
* From Org
* For the signing sheet, what date were they released and by what Org

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Spanish Boilerplate Included in MNCs if the Player Speaks Spanish
custom_steps:
AC:

* If a player has their language set to Spanish on their profile, the Spanish version of the mUPC will be printed along with the English
* This will work similar to existing functionality

title: As a MNC Admin, I want MNC printing updated to accommodate new entry of Performance Bonuses
custom_steps:
Related to [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1628|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1628|smart-link] 

AC:

* Given the new entry format of Performance Bonuses, printing will need to be updated to accommodate the table structure
* Printing will be in line with MJC printing
* All entered terms/clauses/tables/etc, will be represented in the printed MNC
* This update will impact all MNC types

custom_steps:
AC:

* MNC printing will no longer Business Objects
* Esign will continue to work as expected

title: As a MNC Admin, I do not want Clubs to enter custom language on a MNC
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a club user is creating or editing a MNC (any type) Custom will not be an option for them in any language dropdown
* BOC Users will continue being able to enter Custom language on MNCs

title: As a BOC Admin, I want EBIS to consume WhatsApp Numbers from IPL and DPL, if available
custom_steps:
AC:

* If a player has a WhatsApp number available in IPL or DPL, that number should be sent to ebis with the playerâ€™s other contact information
* It should sent as a phone number with a type of WhatsApp
* These numbers will be populated in the Addendum A portion of Minor Contracts

title: As an MNC Admin, I want the AB section of MNCs updated to be in line with MJCs
custom_steps:
Wire: [https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|smart-link] 

Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3783826/MJC+-+Award+Bonuses|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3783826/MJC+-+Award+Bonuses|smart-link] 

AC:

* The Performance Bonus term section of MNCs will be updated from a text box to match the entry mechanism on MJCs
* Users will be able to add:
** clauses
** terms
** place finished tables
** maximums tables
* Users will be able to duplicate clauses
* Users will be able to delete clauses and terms
* Start Year and End Year dropdowns will be driven by the contract years
* Criteria will feature the same criteria as MJCs
* The amount for each clauses will be summed and displayed under Total Offered in the header of the section

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a player memo is sent, EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
 - Deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download

title: As a BOC Admin, I Only Want Clubs to See Social Media Reports They Requested for Domestic Amateurs
custom_steps:
Context: Social Media Reports for Top 300 players are visible to all Clubs.  However, if a Club requests a report on a player that is outside the Top 300, that Club should be the only Club that sees the report, regardless of what Clubs have Origins on the player.

AC:

On the Social Media Utility, clubs will have the ability to request social media reports for domestic amateurs who have signed the consent in DPL

When the report is returned and available in ebis, only the requesting club will be able to see the request

No other clubs will be able to see that a request was made for the player
